Name: 1_traffic_accident_road_restricted
Representative_Docs:
['traffic conditioning

We inform you that, due to a road accident, traffic is congested on the 2nd Ring Road, in the South-North direction, before the exit to Avenida General Correia Barreto.

Drive with caution', 'partial road cut
We inform you that, due to a road accident, traffic is restricted (two lanes on the right removed) on the IC17 towards Algés- Sacavém, next to the exit for the 2nd Ring Road.
Drive with caution.', 'complete road cut
